0.title: The Shawshank Redemption
0.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

1.title: The Godfather
1.summary: The Godfather follows Vito Corleone, Don of the Corleone family, as he passes the mantle to his unwilling son, Michael.

2.title: The Godfather: Part II
2.summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

3.title: The Dark Knight
3.summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

4.title: De 12 gezworenen
4.summary: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

5.title: Schindler's List
5.summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

6.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
6.summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

7.title: Pulp Fiction
7.summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

8.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
8.summary: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

9.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
9.summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

10.title: Fight Club
10.summary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

11.title: Forrest Gump
11.summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweeth

12.title: Inception
12.summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

13.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
13.summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

14.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
14.summary: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

15.title: The Matrix
15.summary: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

16.title: Goodfellas
16.summary: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

17.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
17.summary: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

18.title: Shichinin no samurai
18.summary: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

19.title: Seven
19.summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

20.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
20.summary: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

21.title: The Silence of the Lambs
21.summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

22.title: Cidade de Deus
22.summary: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

23.title: It's a Wonderful Life
23.summary: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

24.title: Het leven is mooi
24.summary: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

25.title: Saving Private Ryan
25.summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

26.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
26.summary: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vad

27.title: Interstellar
27.summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

28.title: Spirited Away
28.summary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

29.title: The Green Mile
29.summary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

30.title: Gisaengchung
30.summary: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

31.title: Léon
31.summary: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

32.title: Seppuku
32.summary: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

33.title: The Pianist
33.summary: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

34.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
34.summary: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son John from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

35.title: Terug naar de toekomst
35.summary: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

36.title: The Usual Suspects
36.summary: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

37.title: Psycho
37.summary: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

38.title: The Lion King
38.summary: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

39.title: Modern Times
39.summary: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

40.title: Hotaru no haka
40.summary: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

41.title: American History X
41.summary: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

42.title: Whiplash
42.summary: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

43.title: Gladiator
43.summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

44.title: City Lights
44.summary: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

45.title: The Departed
45.summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

46.title: The Intouchables
46.summary: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

47.title: The Prestige
47.summary: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

48.title: Casablanca
48.summary: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

49.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
49.summary: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

50.title: Rear Window
50.summary: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend.

51.title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
51.summary: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

52.title: Alien
52.summary: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

53.title: Apocalypse Now
53.summary: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

54.title: Memento
54.summary: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

55.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
55.summary: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

56.title: De dictator
56.summary: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

57.title: Django Unchained
57.summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

58.title: Das Leben der Anderen
58.summary: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

59.title: Het veld van eer
59.summary: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

60.title: Sunset Boulevard
60.summary: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

61.title: WALL·E
61.summary: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

62.title: Avengers: Infinity War
62.summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

63.title: Witness for the Prosecution
63.summary: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

64.title: Spider-Man: Een nieuw universum
64.summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

65.title: The Shining
65.summary: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

66.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
66.summary: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

67.title: Mononoke-hime
67.summary: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

68.title: Oldeuboi
68.summary: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

69.title: Joker
69.summary: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

70.title: Kimi no na wa.
70.summary: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

71.title: Coco
71.summary: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

72.title: The Dark Knight Rises
72.summary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

73.title: Aliens
73.summary: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

74.title: Once Upon a Time in America
74.summary: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

75.title: Avengers: Endgame
75.summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

76.title: Capharnaüm
76.summary: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

77.title: Das Boot
77.summary: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

78.title: Tengoku to jigoku
78.summary: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

79.title: 3 Idiots
79.summary: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

80.title: Toy Story
80.summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

81.title: Amadeus
81.summary: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

82.title: American Beauty
82.summary: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

83.title: Braveheart
83.summary: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

84.title: Inglourious Basterds
84.summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

85.title: Good Will Hunting
85.summary: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

86.title: Hamilton
86.summary: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

87.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
87.summary: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's tr

88.title: Idi i smotri
88.summary: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

89.title: 2001: Een zwerftocht in de ruimte
89.summary: The Monoliths push humanity to reach for the stars; after their discovery in Africa generations ago, the mysterious objects lead mankind on an awesome journey to Jupiter, with the help of H.A.L. 9000: the world's greatest supercomput

90.title: Reservoir Dogs
90.summary: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

91.title: Taare Zameen Par
91.summary: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

92.title: Vertigo
92.summary: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

93.title: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
93.summary: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

94.title: Jagten
94.summary: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent littl

95.title: Citizen Kane
95.summary: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

96.title: Requiem for a Dream
96.summary: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

97.title: Singin' in the Rain
97.summary: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

98.title: North by Northwest
98.summary: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

99.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
99.summary: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

100.title: Ikiru
100.summary: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

101.title: Ladri di biciclette
101.summary: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work. He and his son set out to find it.

102.title: Lawrence of Arabia
102.summary: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

103.title: The Kid
103.summary: The story of a young boy who witnesses Billy the Kid's encounter with Sheriff Pat Garrett.

104.title: Full Metal Jacket
104.summary: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

105.title: Incendies
105.summary: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

106.title: Dangal
106.summary: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

107.title: Het appartement
107.summary: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

108.title: Double Indemnity
108.summary: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

109.title: Metropolis
109.summary: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

110.title: The Father
110.summary: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

111.title: A Separation
111.summary: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

112.title: Taxi Driver
112.summary: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

113.title: A Clockwork Orange
113.summary: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

114.title: The Sting
114.summary: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

115.title: Scarface
115.summary: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

116.title: Snatch
116.summary: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

117.summary: April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

118.title: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
118.summary: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

119.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
119.summary: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

120.title: Toy Story 3
120.summary: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

121.title: For a Few Dollars More
121.summary: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down an escaped Mexican outlaw.

122.title: Pather Panchali
122.summary: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

123.title: Up
123.summary: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

124.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
124.summary: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

125.title: Heat
125.summary: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

126.title: L.A. Confidential
126.summary: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

127.title: Ran
127.summary: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

128.title: Yôjinbô
128.summary: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

129.title: Die Hard
129.summary: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

130.title: Green Book
130.summary: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

131.title: Rashômon
131.summary: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

132.title: Der Untergang
132.summary: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

133.title: All About Eve
133.summary: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

134.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
134.summary: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

135.title: Some Like It Hot
135.summary: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

136.title: Batman Begins
136.summary: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

137.title: Unforgiven
137.summary: A woman is released from prison after serving a sentence for a violent crime and re-enters a society that refuses to forgive her past.

138.title: Bacheha-Ye aseman
138.summary: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

139.title: Jai Bhim
139.summary: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

140.title: Hauru no ugoku shiro
140.summary: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

141.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
141.summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

142.title: Oordeel te Neurenberg
142.summary: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

143.title: There Will Be Blood
143.summary: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

144.title: The Great Escape
144.summary: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

145.title: Casino
145.summary: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

146.title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
146.summary: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

147.title: Pan's Labyrinth
147.summary: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

148.title: A Beautiful Mind
148.summary: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

149.title: El secreto de sus ojos
149.summary: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

150.title: Raging Bull
150.summary: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

151.title: Chinatown
151.summary: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

152.title: Tonari no Totoro
152.summary: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

153.title: Shutter Island
153.summary: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

154.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
154.summary: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

155.title: No Country for Old Men
155.summary: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

156.title: Klaus
156.summary: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

157.title: Dial M for Murder
157.summary: A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.

158.title: The Gold Rush
158.summary: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

159.title: The Thing
159.summary: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

160.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
160.summary: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

161.title: Dersu Uzala
161.summary: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

162.title: Det sjunde inseglet
162.summary: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

163.title: The Elephant Man
163.summary: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

164.title: The Sixth Sense
164.summary: A frightened, withdrawn Philadelphia boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

165.title: The Truman Show
165.summary: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

166.title: Jurassic Park
166.summary: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

167.title: Smultronstället
167.summary: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

168.title: The Third Man
168.summary: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

169.title: Salinui chueok
169.summary: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

170.title: V for Vendetta
170.summary: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V," plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

171.title: Blade Runner
171.summary: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

172.title: Trainspotting
172.summary: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

173.title: Fargo
173.summary: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Yet all of these tales mysteriously lead back one way or another to Fargo, North Dakota.

174.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
174.summary: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

175.title: Binnenstebuiten
175.summary: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

176.title: Finding Nemo
176.summary: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

177.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
177.summary: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

178.title: Warrior
178.summary: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

179.title: Gejaagd door de wind
179.summary: The manipulative daughter of a Georgia plantation owner conducts a turbulent romance with a roguish profiteer during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

180.title: Tôkyô monogatari
180.summary: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

181.title: On the Waterfront
181.summary: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

182.title: Babam ve Oglum
182.summary: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

183.title: Relatos salvajes
183.summary: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

184.title: Prisoners
184.summary: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

185.title: Stalker
185.summary: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

186.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
186.summary: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

187.title: The Deer Hunter
187.summary: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

188.title: The General
188.summary: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy

189.title: Sherlock Jr.
189.summary: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

190.title: Gran Torino
190.summary: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

191.title: Persona
191.summary: A man diagnosed with Alzheimer's decides to punish criminals.

192.title: Before Sunrise
192.summary: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

193.title: Mary and Max.
193.summary: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

194.title: Catch Me If You Can
194.summary: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

195.title: Dune
195.summary: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

196.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
196.summary: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his char

197.title: Barry Lyndon
197.summary: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

198.title: Z
198.summary: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

199.title: In the Name of the Father
199.summary: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

200.title: Hacksaw Ridge
200.summary: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

201.title: Gone Girl
201.summary: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

202.title: Room
202.summary: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

203.title: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc
203.summary: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

204.title: Andhadhun
204.summary: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

205.title: Le Mans '66
205.summary: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

206.title: 12 Years a Slave
206.summary: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

207.title: Spionnage in het spel
207.summary: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

208.title: The Big Lebowski
208.summary: Ultimate L.A. slacker Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for a rug ruined by debt collectors, enlisting his bowling buddies for help while trying to find the millionaire's missing

209.title: Dead Poets Society
209.summary: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

210.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
210.summary: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

211.title: Ben Hur
211.summary: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

212.title: How to Train Your Dragon
212.summary: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

213.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
213.summary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

214.title: Höstsonaten
214.summary: A devoted wife is visited by her mother, a successful concert pianist who had little time for her when she was young.

215.title: Million Dollar Baby
215.summary: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

216.title: Het loon van de Angst
216.summary: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

217.title: Stand by Me
217.summary: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

218.title: Ah-ga-ssi
218.summary: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

219.title: Network
219.summary: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.

220.title: Logan
220.summary: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

221.title: La haine
221.summary: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

222.title: Koe no katachi
222.summary: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

223.title: Cool Hand Luke
223.summary: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

224.title: Hachi
224.summary: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

225.title: Gangs of Wasseypur
225.summary: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

226.title: Les quatre cents coups
226.summary: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

227.title: Platoon
227.summary: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

228.title: Spotlight
228.summary: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

229.title: Monsters, Inc.
229.summary: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

230.title: Rebecca
230.summary: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.

231.title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
231.summary: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

232.title: Fa yeung nin wah
232.summary: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

233.title: Hotel Rwanda
233.summary: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

234.title: Eskiya
234.summary: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

235.title: Rush
235.summary: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

236.title: Rocky
236.summary: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

237.title: Amores perros
237.summary: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

238.title: Into the Wild
238.summary: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, C

239.title: Kaze no tani no Naushika
239.summary: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

240.title: Het gebeurde op 'n avond
240.summary: A renegade reporter trailing a young runaway heiress for a big story joins her on a bus heading from Florida to New York, and they end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

241.title: Before Sunset
241.summary: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

242.title: Fanny och Alexander
242.summary: Two young Swedish children in the 1900s experience the many comedies and tragedies of their lively and affectionate theatrical family, the Ekdahls.

243.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Mugen Ressha-Hen
243.summary: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

244.title: De slag om Algiers
244.summary: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

245.title: Le notti di Cabiria
245.summary: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

246.title: Drishyam
246.summary: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

247.title: Andrei Rublev
247.summary: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

248.title: Shin seiki Evangelion Gekijô-ban: Air/Magokoro wo, kimi ni
248.summary: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Shin seiki evangerion (1995).

249.title: Drishyam 2
249.summary: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?
